All Classes

Class Description
AskForPoem
Command object representing the user request for a poem in a certain language.
Boundary
The boundary class is the only point of communication with left-side driver adapters.
ConsoleWriter
Right-side, driven adapter for writing text to the console.
DisplayRandomPoem
The command handler for displaying a random poem.
GetPoetry
Driven, right side port for obtaining poems, e.g.
HardcodedPoemLibrary
Right-side, driven adapter that acts as repository for poems.
IReactToCommands  
Main
Main class that starts the hexagon example application.
Poem  
RandomPoemPicker
Picks a random poem from a list of poems.
SimulatedUser
The driver adapter.
WritePoems
Driven, right side port for writing the lines of a poem to an output device outside the hexagon, e.g.
